code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{blogPosts}from'../data/blogPosts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"py-20 bg-gray-50",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h2,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.5},className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900",children:"Tin T\u1EE9c & C\u1EADp Nh\u1EADt"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-4 text-xl text-gray-600",children:"C\u1EADp nh\u1EADt nh\u1EEFng tin t\u1EE9c m\u1EDBi nh\u1EA5t v\u1EC1 c\xF4ng ngh\u1EC7 v\xE0 gi\u1EA3i ph\xE1p"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-12 grid gap-8 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3",children:blogPosts.map((post,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.article,{initial:{opacity:0,y:20},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.5,delay:index*0.1},className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"h-48 w-full object-cover",src:post.image,alt:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500 mb-2",children:post.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold mb-2",children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-4",children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog/".concat(post.id),className:"text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 font-medium",children:"\u0110\u1ECDc th\xEAm \u2192"})]})]},post.id))})]})});};export default Blog;
